# [FEAT] Multi-language Support

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `customization`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement multi-language support for the help center and agent interface.

## Requirements

### Supported Languages
- 40+ languages support
- Custom language additions
- RTL language support
- Language detection

### Content Translation
- Article translations
- Category translations
- UI string translations
- Translation workflow
- Translation memory

### Language Management
- Enable/disable languages
- Default language setting
- Fallback language rules
- Language-specific URLs

### User Experience
- Language selector
- Browser language detection
- User language preferences
- Language-specific content visibility

### Translation Features
- Machine translation integration
- Translation status tracking
- Missing translation indicators
- Bulk translation export/import
- Translation APIs

### Agent Interface
- Admin interface localization
- Agent workspace localization
- Localized macros
- Localized email templates

## Zendesk Reference
The localized admin interface of Zendesk is available in over 40 local languages. You can localize the help center contents to be displayed in different languages.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Multiple languages configurable
- [ ] Article translation works
- [ ] UI properly localized
- [ ] Language detection works
- [ ] Translation workflow functional
